hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Map of the Spirit Temple# and #a Deku Stick#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Sun's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Weird Egg#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Claim Check#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: It's so lonely being stuck here with nobody else to talk to...

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Claim Check#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Ice Arrows# and #the Gerudo Mask#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Next you'll say:^"Why am I still reading these?"

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Flame Circle Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Weird Egg#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #a Water Temple Compass#.
